title: Horizon UI Admin Dashboard
description: an admin dashboard built based on the free community version of the horizon-ui admin dashboard user interface on figma community including many features such as charts, tables, lists, calendar, marketplace, sign-in form with validation, full-page search, and etc.

title: Online Code Editor
description: an online code editor which supports HTML, Css, and Javascript with features such as built-in javascript console, expandable and resizable text fields, fullscreen mode, and also a live mode so that you can see the results as you code them

title: All Things Colors
description: a web application that provides you with different color utility tools to boost your speed and productivity - pre-defined gradients, random gradient generator, tints and shades generator, color palette generator, image palette extractor, and color mixer

title: Cryptoify
description: a web application for you to check more than 300 crypto currencies including a responsive table for all screen sizes and also features like searching coins based on name or id, chart price changes table with different timeframes available, pagination and per-page options, and support for three major currencies (usd, eur, gbp)
